text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text:
Well, well. If it isn't Tracen Academy, Tokyo's former 
strongest school's Jungle Pocket! It is such an honor 
for me to meet with you directly.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
If it isn't the Head of Gungnir. I heard you had quite 
the time playing with some of my friends.

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text:
Yes, and wasn't that fun!? I'm just disappointed 
we had to cut it short and we couldn't see the 
despair and frustration on their faces.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: In that case, isn't it your turn next?

text_block_list.name: Gungnir Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Huh!? The hell just came out of your disgusting mouth!?

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text:
Hold it. They came all this way, so let them talk. Either way, 
they will soon join their friends to wipe each other's tears.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Hey Café, those guys at Gungnir are all wearing 
the same black jerseys and masks. Do you think 
that's for sun protection?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
I don't know, and I don't care about such 
pointless things. If you're thinking of trying 
to get a reaction from them, please stop.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: I'm fine with doing this fairly. Just hurry up with the rules.

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text:
Don't be so quick to rush. This will be a relay team race. 
The first segment of the race will start here on this freestyle 
race field where you will then run out…

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text: Then pass underneath the bridge over the river nearby.

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text: And then run through a course in the woods.

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text:
And finally, you will return to the course 
here. The first team to return wins.

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text:
Someone let them have some time with the course. 
So, you three are planning to run the relay together?

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Yeah… What about your team?

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text: Kuku, for us, we'll have the entirety of Gungnir participate!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: No matter how you look at it, they have well over 10 members.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Nobody ever said that this race would be 3 on 3. 
But still, this is some crazy idea.

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text:
Hey, hey. Unlike the elites at Tracen Academy, we 
are just a group of non-professionals. Would you 
really feel satisfied going against such a team?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
I see now. So just like that, you provoked 
the underclassmen's sense of pride.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Well, do what you want. I'll be the one 
following your rules anyways. But…

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: If you lose like this, you do know what'll happen, right?

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text:
Guh! Heh, what kind of idiot starts the race thinking of defeat? 
The same goes for you. Better start worrying about how to 
cheer yourselves up when you get dusted.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Well, how do you all want to set up the running order?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Isn't it obvious. I will run from the start to the bridge. 
Café will handle the woods. And the person to finish 
the race will be you, Pokke.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: If you were to lay out our specialties, this is the best way, no?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: There's no room for me to argue, but it does leave a bad taste.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
What are you saying!? To win, we must take the most 
rational approach! Well, what about you Pokke?

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: I'm game. Thanks for leaving the juicy part of the race for me.

text_block_list.name: Gungnir Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
Without a doubt, the two with Jungle Pocket 
are Agnes Tachyon and Manhattan Café.

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text:
I thought so. They've brought quite a famous team, 
haven't they. Though you've just made it all the easier 
to take countermeasures against you!

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text: Now then, let's start! Line up, line up!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Fufu, I've never ran alongside so many horsegirls wearing 
black jerseys. This is quite an interesting experience.

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text: Ready… Go!!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Oh no～! I'm having a late start. 
This sure is a pickle. I really must hurry～!

text_block_list.name: Gungnir Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Ha ha! Has she given up on winning?

text_block_list.name: Gungnir Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
No, something is wrong. The Agnes Tachyon I saw 
at the Twinkle Series ran nothing like this!

text_block_list.name: Gungnir Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
(Is she planning on giving up the lead 
to plan on coming from behind?!)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
It's obvious what you're thinking of. Fufu, for now 
I'll let the person in first run in peace.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
We're finally at the riverside… As I thought, 
this terrain is difficult to run on.

text_block_list.name: Gungnir Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
Change of plans! If they're lagging then increase the gap! 
We know this place inside-out!! They won't be able to keep up!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Kuku, figures that they wouldn't race on their home turf 
without any tricks. Hmmm. I see. So, you can run here like this.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Thanks for the tip.

text_block_list.name: Gungnir Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
What!? She suddenly started to accelerate! 
Did she discover our personal route!?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Hello friends! I must thank you for the wonderful data! 
With this, I can run a lot more easily! Aha ha ha!

text_block_list.name: Gungnir Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: S-she, she's way too fast! What in the world is she made of…!!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Good work. As expected, you were able to take the lead.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
I leave the rest to you. I'm guessing they will have 
other tricks coming up so be careful.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: … I will make sure to remain vigilant.
